course_title: Fresh Sem:Environmentl Studies: Writing Bodies in the World
class_notes:
(Same as ENGCW 190 1, AAS 190 3, LACS 190 1)
Complete course atlas information (including texts and grading) will be available on the Creative Writing Program website: https://creativewriting.emory.edu/index.html
course_description: The topics for freshman seminars are variable and change every semester. Past offerings include Climate Change, Global Earth Systems, Interpreting Behavior That You Can't See, Ecological Economics, Plants, People and Places and Ecological Restoration.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4100, Section #: 3, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-3:45p, Instructor: T. Yanique, Status: Closed
